QuestData.Title: Enraged By Hatred
QuestData.Description: These scorpions are infected with sha. It seems to have driven them out of their hole and into our camp, seething with hatred at invaders in their territory.$B$BWe need to clear the scorpions and secure the camp. Kill any you find.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Sha of Hatred's passing did this to them. I doubt this is the only thing that will have been affected by its passing.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. What's left of the camp will be a bit safer.
